title: I drew Ahri cooking pancakes
body:
I draw league stuff using my Wii U tablet, its not the easiest thing to use  (/-(ｴ)-＼)

hope you all like it

replies.body: That pancake...if far larger than the pan. WHAT BLACK MAGIC IS THIS?

Its really hard to draw on the wii u lol, i think i tried drawing the pan like 10 times then when i finally got it right it turned out a little too small so i was like "screw it" so i left it like that hehe
I was wondering what you did it with lol, that's pretty good :3 Is that an app you had to download or one of the things that came with it?

Yeah I downloaded an app, its called Art Academy. Only 2 dollars I believe, its really cheap 

its a nice app x333
Is it on 3ds?
Sellout.
{{champion:67}}  Black magics?
Maybe the pancake is in the foreground
AHRI, for the last freaking time: Stop throwing pancakes at me!

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=E0E8ENAt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T02:47:41.689+0000)
>
> That pancake...if far larger than the pan. WHAT BLACK MAGIC IS THIS?

The pan is bigger from the inside.
This is absolutely adorable!!!

Thank you! :D 

I have a lot more that I did, i might post them all sometime this week

in the meantime heres pantheon selling cookies to minions

> [{quoted}](name=Lightniing,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=E0E8ENAt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-12T14:18:26.283+0000)
>
> Thank you! :D 
> 
> I have a lot more that I did, i might post them all sometime this week
> 
> in the meantime heres pantheon selling cookies to minions

O M G  BAKER PANTH!!!! 
Any way it need to becaume a skin some day!
XD he did always want to be a baker!
I vote the next pancake maker to be Warwick!

I might just do that, thanks for the suggestion

Maybe warwick should be cooking a star insead
You could do a whole series, league of pancakes
I.....I think you're on to something......
{{champion:421}} loves to do pancakes too :(
I guess the general consensus is that everyone should be cooking pancakes @____@ this may take some time.....
you a ww x ahri shipper too?
Naw, just seems like a Warwick thing to do.
nice. I wish i could draw half as well as this.
your art style is pretty cute! it's nice~

10/10
I love how the frying pan looks like a handheld singularity :P
Thank you kindly ;p
rofl those minions remind me of slugs
they do look like slugs hehe
10/10 would fuck.
O-oh...
Really cute! I like pancakes. ♥
thank you, i wasnt expecting all of this positive feedback tbh! :D
She is so kawaii :D
I tried to make her as cute as I could!

I like how the pancake itself came out.

Might be because I'm hungry...
Go get some food!
good job :)
Thank you friend

haha fucking pancakes

Necro inc

replies.poster: O o b l e c k
replies.body: Looks tip top old sport. Looks like a big bit of sliced ham and {{champion:103}} has no Idea what to do with it XD
Whatever happened to that old story about Ahri making Garen pancakes or cookies or whatever for helping fix her shed that was on the old forums?
"not enough pancakes" 5/10 - IGN
I would Marry Her
But are they bacon pancakes?
love it!
thats the quality u get from using nintendo
You're hired, effective immediately
HIred for what????! :O
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) stuff
